<<<<<<< HEAD
The voyce of Providence asserted, and the followers of God in the waies of His Providence justified in a letter sent by John Hinde to a minister in London, who denied the former and condemned the latter. Hinde, John, 17th cent.
[3], 12, [1] p.
Printed for Peter Cole, at the Printing-press, by the Royal Exchange, London : 1653.
Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
